My family and I had a lovely stay at this house. Alexis and Jacky are attentive hosts, very communicative with prompt and professional responses. They assisted us with a few questions before booking, even following up the day before check-in to make sure everything had been addressed. They remained available for communication throughout the stay and made sure we had all our check-out info the night before. They were wonderful, and are very open to receiving feedback on how to make their visitor’s experience even better.
The house itself was great. It’s not easy to find a one-story house with 5 bedrooms! It was pretty clean inside, nothing to cause any alarm.
Fully functional kitchen with fridge/freezer, coffee machine, cooking equipment, plates and utensils, etc.
Dining area and living room were roomy enough to seat 6-8 people comfortably. There were some games stored in the living room (we played Cards Against Humanity for hours and hours), which was a nice touch! Also a Smart TV in the living room and in each bedroom.
Each bedroom was also furnished with comfortable bedding and some furniture, along with ceiling fans to supplement the central air conditioning. Two bedrooms had full en-suite bathrooms and there was a third full bathroom in the hall.
Washing machine and dryer worked great.
We didn’t get a chance to use the backyard (hottest weekend of the summer! No one wanted to go outside).
Driveway easily fit two cars and there was street parking available. The neighborhood was quiet and the house was only a couple minutes away from plenty of stores and restaurants.
Overall, it was a great stay in a great house for a great price with great hosts!
